data.subject: Can we help?
data.body:
Hi {{cart_billing_first_name}}

I noticed that you were trying to purchase the following items:

{{cart_items template='cart-table'}}

But couldn't complete the process. 

Don't worry we have reserved the cart for you.

Click here to complete your purchase. 

And if you have any questions, hit reply and ask away. 

Thanks!

data.subject: You got a deal...
data.body:
Hi {{cart_billing_first_name}}

You were trying to purchase from our website yesterday but could not complete the process.

To help you make up your mind, here's a deal for you. 

When you use this coupon code at the checkout, you can avail an instant discount: 

**coupon_name**

But hurry up, this deal is valid only for the next 48 hours. 

Head back to your cart and complete your purchase >>

If you have any questions, just hit reply. 

Thanks!

data.subject: Your coupon code expires in 24 hours
data.body:
Hi {{cart_billing_first_name}}

Your coupon code '**coupon_name**' is valid only for the next 24 hours. 

Once it expires, you will have to buy the items at full price and we know you don't want that. :) Who does! 

So act fast. 

Click here to complete your purchase. 

If you have any questions, feel free to get in touch with me.

Thanks!
